resources.string: Nothing saved yet! Use the button in bottom-right corner to scan a new document.

MLKit Document Scanner SDK could not be initialized. This may be caused by a number of reasons, so please make sure that Your device:
* has Google Play Services enabled and up-to-date
* is running at least Android 5 (API 21)
* has at least 2Gb of RAM
MLKit SDK was initialized correctly, but the scanner process failed to start
